title: malphite. ap or ad
body: lately ive been playing malphite alot. i usually go full tank but sometimes i need to carry so i need attack items. for those attack items on malphite is it better to get ap items or ad items?

replies.body: {{item:3285}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3116}}  are items you get instead of tank
AP since malphite only scales off of AP and armour for damage. In the end though tank malphite is the best malphite.
tbh I haven't used that build since the Malphite rework. Closest build I've used since was just me abusing Rageblade when it got reworked.

AP without a doubt
I recommend all the items Talon12 said
I play him AP all the time in fun game modes like Urf or Ascension and it's quite easy to 100-0 any non-tanks with an ult+e+q even without a rabadons
{{item:3027}} {{item:3001}}  then build tanky you really dont need full ad or ap malphite to wreck, you will just melt full ap or ad.
